subject: Pro Bowl
Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: Drew Hill arrived in the N.F.L. as an unheralded 12th-round draft pick and became a Pro Bowl receiver in 1988 and 1990.
snippet: Drew Hill arrived in the N.F.L. as an unheralded 12th-round draft pick and became a Pro Bowl receiver in 1988 and 1990.
